basic.description: This undergraduate survey course addresses key conceptual issues regarding the functions and siting of contemporary public art, providing students with a working knowledge of the relevant critical literature. Students will also learn the basic components of writing a public art project proposal.
basic.subject: ARH
basic.title: Contemporary Art in Public Spaces

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: ART 1000, ART 1201C, ART 1203, ART 1300C, ART 1602C and ART 2204C.
